title: Ethereum’s MVRV Reaches 11-Month Low Amidst Market Sell-Off
description:
Glassnode Alerts revealed earlier today that ETH’s MVRV has reached a new 11-month low. Meanwhile, the altcoin’s non-zero addresses have reached a new all-time high over the past 24 hours. At press time, ETH was trading at $1,724.82 after it saw a price decrease of more than 6%. The on-chain analysis platform, Glassnode Alerts, shared […]

The post Ethereum’s MVRV Reaches 11-Month Low Amidst Market Sell-Off appeared first on Coin Edition.
